project.name: Xeasyconf-ng
project.description: This document specifies the tasks, specs, state of the new Xeasyconf.

longdescription.p: Xeasyconf is good but not easily maintainable, in bash, only ppc oriented. Xeasyconf-ng is a rewrite, using libconf/glueconf. It can be seen as a demonstration/prototype of libconf/glueconf based application

task.name: xf86config glueconf module
task.description: debugging and ending of the xf86config glueconf module
task.longdescription: The glueconf module that maps xf86config config file to a easy to use structure is not perfect, and need adjustments, debuggings and tests.
